dataset_id: Global Distribution of Plant-Extractable Water Capacity of Soil (Dunne)
title: Global Distribution of Plant-Extractable Water Capacity of Soil (Dunne)
summary: Plant-extractable water capacity of soil is the amount of water that can be extracted from the soil to fulfill evapotranspiration demands. This data set provides an estimate of the global distribution of plant-extractable water capacity of soil.
